'''''Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds''''' (Japanese: '''''ソニックレーシング クロスワールド''''') is a kart racing video game published by {{w|Sega}}.

''Minecraft'' content was added to the game on October 8, 2025<ref>{{ytl|gzbMtVcJ2Ug|Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Minecraft Pack Launch Trailer|Sonic the Hedgehog|October 8, 2025}}</ref>  as part of its Season Pass, which is also included in the ''Digital Deluxe Edition''.<ref name=website>{{Citation|url=https://RaceCrossWorlds.com|title=''Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds''|website=Sega}}</ref>

== Background ==
''Sonic Racing'' is a series part of the larger ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog]]'' franchise that features various Sega and third party characters racing against one another in karts on various differently themed courses. Its first entry, ''{{w|Sonic and Sega All-Stars Racing}}'', was released in 2010. Announced at the tail end of the [https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Fearless:_Year_of_Shadow Fearless: Year of Shadow], ''Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds'' is the unofficial fourth installment of the series and was released on September 25, 2025. The game features ''Minecraft'' content as paid downloadable content, as well as other guest characters such as {{w|Ichiban Kasuga}} from ''{{w|Yakuza (franchise)|Like a Dragon}}'', {{w|Joker (Persona)|Joker}} from ''{{w|Persona (series)|Persona}}'', {{W|Hatsune Miku}}, NiGHTS, AiAi from ''Super Monkey Ball'', [[SpongeBob SquarePants]], [[Pac-Man|PAC-MAN]], and Mega Man.
